message_1: Suppose you want to encrypt the message "MEET ME AT THE PARK" using Caesar cipher with a shift of 5. What would be the encrypted message?
message_2: To encrypt the message "MEET ME AT THE PARK" using a Caesar cipher with a shift of 5, you would shift each letter in the message 5 positions forward in the alphabet. The encrypted message would be "RJJY RJ FY YMJ UFTL".
